p: The phase diagram for binary (1- x)NaNbO 3 – xCa 2Nb 2O 7 consists of two fundamentally different concentration ranges [ 10]. In the 0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20 range, the perovskite-type SS are formed on the basis of NaNbO 3, the symmetry of which changes from orthorhombic to cubic as the concentration of Ca 2Nb 2O 7 in the composition increases. In the 0.20 < x ≤ 1.00 region PLS of А nВ nO 3n+ 2 ( n = 4–10) series are formed.
